org.devgateway.toolkit.persistence.validator

Class HibernateValidatorFactoryBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation.SpringValidatorAdapter
      • org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation.LocalValidatorFactoryBean
        • org.devgateway.toolkit.persistence.validator.HibernateValidatorFactoryBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.validation.Validator, javax.validation.ValidatorFactory, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.validation.SmartValidator

    @Component
public class HibernateValidatorFactoryBean
extends org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation.LocalValidatorFactoryBean
    Configure and expose a bean validator based on HibernateValidator. Also configures and constraints defined in FM, see FMConstraintsConfigurer.
